briefdescription.para: Last auxiliary view rendered frame number.
Flag for whether is subscribed to animation updates.
Flag to suppress parameter hash and memory use recalculation when setting multiple shader parameters (loading or resetting the material).
Associated scene for shader parameter animation updates.
Load resource from stream. May be called from a worker thread. Return true if successful.
Finish resource loading. Always called from the main thread. Return true if successful.
Save resource. Return true if successful.
Load from an XML element. Return true if successful.
Save to an XML element. Return true if successful.
Load from a JSON value. Return true if successful.
Save to a JSON value. Return true if successful.

detaileddescription.para: Set number of techniques. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned index, Technique *tech, MaterialQuality qualityLevel=QUALITY_LOW, float lodDistance=0.0f)
memberdef.name: SetTechnique

detaileddescription.para: Set additional vertex shader defines. Separate multiple defines with spaces. Setting defines at the material level causes technique(s) to be cloned as necessary. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set additional pixel shader defines. Separate multiple defines with spaces. Setting defines at the material level causes technique(s) to be cloned as necessary. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set shader parameter. BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_shaderParameters

memberdef.argsstring: (const String &name, ValueAnimation *animation, WrapMode wrapMode=WM_LOOP, float speed=1.0f)
memberdef.name: SetShaderParameterAnimation

briefdescription.para: Set shader parameter animation wrap mode.

detaileddescription.para: Set texture. BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_textures
Set culling mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set culling mode for shadows. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set polygon fill mode. Interacts with the camera's fill mode setting so that the "least filled" mode will be used. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Set depth bias parameters for depth write and compare. Note that the normal offset parameter is not used and will not be saved, as it affects only shadow map sampling during light rendering. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set alpha-to-coverage mode on all passes. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set line antialiasing on/off. Has effect only on models that consist of line lists. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set 8-bit render order within pass. Default 128. Lower values will render earlier and higher values later, taking precedence over e.g. state and distance sorting. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether to use in occlusion rendering. Default true. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Associate the material with a scene to ensure that shader parameter animation happens in sync with scene update, respecting the scene time scale. If no scene is set, the global update events will be used. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Ensure that material techniques are listed in correct order.
Mark material for auxiliary view rendering.

detaileddescription.para: Return number of techniques. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return technique by index. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_techniques

briefdescription.para: Return pass by technique index and pass name.

detaileddescription.para: Return texture by unit. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_textures
Return additional vertex shader defines. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return additional pixel shader defines. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return shader parameter. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_shaderParameters

briefdescription.para: Return shader parameter animation wrap mode.

detaileddescription.para: Return normal culling mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return culling mode for shadows. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return polygon fill mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return depth bias. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return alpha-to-coverage mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether line antialiasing is enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return render order. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return last auxiliary view rendered frame number.

detaileddescription.para: Return whether should render occlusion. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the scene associated with the material for shader parameter animation updates. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return shader parameter hash value. Used as an optimization to avoid setting shader parameters unnecessarily.
Load resource synchronously. Call both BeginLoad() & EndLoad() and return true if both succeeded.

detaileddescription.para: Register object factory. NO_BIND

briefdescription.para: Parse a shader parameter value from a string. Retunrs either a bool, a float, or a 2 to 4-component vector.
Helper function for loading JSON files.
Helper function for loading XML files.
Recalculate the memory used by the material.
Reapply shader defines to technique index. By default reapply all.
Update whether should be subscribed to scene or global update events for shader parameter animation.
